meanings.sent1: The students will foregather in the library for their group project.
meanings.sent2: The family decided to foregather for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: The animals foregathered around the watering hole, creating a cute scene.
meanings.sent4: The stars foregathered in the night sky, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers foregathered in the garden, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: To meet or come together in a group
meanings.sent1: The team will foregather before the game to discuss their strategy.
meanings.sent2: The community will foregather at the town hall to address the issue.
meanings.sent3: The birds foregathered on the tree branch, chirping happily.
meanings.sent4: The clouds foregathered in the sky, signaling an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The children foregathered in the playground, laughing and playing together.
